Based on your preferences and the information you provided, I would recommend two movies that are similar in genre and theme.

The first movie is "Taxi Driver" which was released in 1976. This movie tells the story of a taxi driver named Travis Bickle who becomes obsessed with the four women he picks up at various New York City locations. As Travis' obsession grows, he begins to act on his thoughts and fantasies.

The second movie is "Prometheus" which was released in 2012. This movie tells the story of a joint USA- Soviet expedition that is sent to Jupiter to learn exactly what happened to the "Discovery" and its H. A. L. 9000 computer. The expedition consists of five crew members who are all American. However, the expedition also includes two Soviet crew members who are both Russian.

The two movies have similar themes and genres as they both tell stories about exploration, discovery and the consequences of those actions.
